fr.liglab.adele.icasa.simulator
Interface SimulationManager

All Superinterfaces:
ContextManager
public interface SimulationManager
extends ContextManager

The simulation Mananger deals with operations associated to simulation

Author:
Gabriel Pedraza Ferreira

Method Detail

setDeviceFault

void setDeviceFault(String deviceId,
                    boolean value)
Simulates a fail/reparation in a device.

Parameters:
deviceId - The device to manipulate.
value - true to simulate a fail. falseto repair.

createDevice

LocatedDevice createDevice(String deviceType,
                           String deviceId,
                           Map<String,Object> properties)
Creates an instance of a simulated device.

Parameters:
deviceType - The device type
deviceId - The new device identifier.
properties - The properties for the new simulated device.
Returns:
The device wrapper object.
Throws:
IllegalArgumentException - if a device instance exists with the same identifier.
IllegalStateException - if there no exists a factory matching the deviceType argument.
See Also:
LocatedDevice

removeDevice

void removeDevice(String deviceId)
Removes a simulated device instance.

Parameters:
deviceId - The identifier of the simulated device.

getSimulatedDeviceTypes

Set<String> getSimulatedDeviceTypes()
Get a non-modifiable set of the device types available in the iCasa context. The device type corresponds to the component factory name.

Returns:
a set of the device types.

removeAllDevices

void removeAllDevices()
Removes all simulated device instance in iCasa.

                   String zoneId)
Moves a person to a zone, into a random generated position inside the given zone.

Parameters:
personName - the name of the person.
zoneId - the zone identifier.

removeAllPersons

void removeAllPersons()
Removes all simulated persons in iCasa.

addPerson

Person addPerson(String personName,
                 String personType)
Creates an instance of a new simulated person. There are six person types available [Grandfather, Grandmother,Father, Mother, Boy, Girl].

Parameters:
personName - the new person name.
personType - the person type
Returns:
the created person.
Throws:
IllegalArgumentException - when a person with the same name exists or if no exist the personType.
See Also:
addPersonType(String)

getPerson

Get a person instance currently available in iCasa simulator.

Parameters:
personName - the person to retrieve.
Returns:
the Person object instance. null if does not exist.

addPersonType

PersonType addPersonType(String personType)
Add a new person type to the simulation only if it not exist. The call of this method will trigger a personTypeAdded event only it is not already added.

Parameters:
personType - the new person type name.
See Also:
.

Parameters:
personType - the person type name.
Returns:
the personType if exist, null if not.
